inclusion.criterion: Eighteen (18) years of age or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderate to severe (≥3+) or severe (≥4+) mitral valve regurgitation (per American Society of Echocardiography (ASE) guidelines) due to mitral valve prolapse or flail
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Intermediate or high surgical risk for mitral valve repair
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of prior repair or replacement of the mitral valve, annuloplasty or valvuloplasty or has a left atrial appendage closure device
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 34 year old woman with Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
